channel.title: CVE Feed for B&R Industrial Automation -- Automation Studio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for B&R Industrial Automation -- Automation Studio

item.title: CVE-2021-22281|2024-08-21T17:32:38.731Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- automation%20studio
item.description: : Relative Path Traversal vulnerability in B&R Industrial Automation Automation Studio allows Relative Path Traversal.This issue affects Automation Studio: from 4.0 through 4.12.

item.title: CVE-2021-22280|2024-08-03T18:37:18.537Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- automation%20studio
item.description: Improper DLL loading algorithms in B&R Automation Studio versions >=4.0 and <4.12 may allow an authenticated local attacker to execute code in the context of the product.

item.title: CVE-2021-22280|2024-07-26T15:53:35.178Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- automation%20studio
item.description: Improper DLL loading algorithms in B&R Automation Studio versions >=4.0 and <4.12 may allow an authenticated local attacker to execute code in the context of the product.
